sentences.text: Microsoft cloud surpassed $110,000,000,000 in annual revenue, up 27% in constant currency with Azure all up accounting for more than 50 percent of the total for the first time.
Every customer I speak with is asking not only how, but how fast they can apply next generation AI to address the biggest opportunities and challenges they face and to do so safely and responsibly.
To that end, we remain focused on 3 key priorities.
1st, helping customers use the breadth and depth of Microsoft Cloud to get the most value onto their spend.
2nd, investing to lead in the new AI platform shift by infusing AI across every layer of the tech stack and third, driving operating leverage.
Now I'll highlight examples of our progress starting with infrastructure.
